languages.text: Лорд-капитан пытается приблизиться к дверям, но те окружены паникующими людьми, колотящими в неподдающиеся створки. Внезапно двери распахиваются, толпа устремляется наружу — и оставляет после себя несколько затоптанных тел. Лорд-капитан только чудом выбирается следом без ранений.

traits.locale_text: Один из офицеров вырывает у помощника аугментированный противогаз и прикладывает к лицу. Второй, последовав его примеру, вонзает кинжал в плечо ближайшему человеку в респираторе, и замечает капитанские знаки отличия. Вереща от страха, офицер поскальзывается на луже крови и разбивает голову об угол когитатора. А Вольный Торговец уходит через шахту лифта...

languages.text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан пытается приблизиться к дверям, но те окружены паникующими людьми, колотящими в неподдающиеся створки. Внезапно двери распахиваются, толпа устремляется наружу — и оставляет после себя несколько затоптанных тел. Лорд-капитан только чудом выбирается следом без ранений.

The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} intenta llegar a las puertas, pero están rodeadas de gente presa del pánico que las aporrea. De pronto, las puertas se abren y la muchedumbre irrumpe como una riada, pisando a cualquiera que haya en su camino. Milagrosamente, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} logra salir iles{mf|o|a}.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} intenta llegar a las puertas, pero están rodeadas de gente presa del pánico que las aporrea. De pronto, las puertas se abren y la muchedumbre irrumpe como una riada, pisando a cualquiera que haya en su camino. Milagrosamente, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} logra salir iles{mf|o|a}.

languages.text: 领主舰长试图冲到门边，但大门已经被惊慌失措的船员包围了，每个人都在用拳头拼命砸着门。突然间，大门打开了，人群涌了出来，留下几具遭到踩踏的尸体。领主舰长能安然无恙地走出来，简直是个奇迹。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长试图冲到门边，但大门已经被惊慌失措的船员包围了，每个人都在用拳头拼命砸着门。突然间，大门打开了，人群涌了出来，留下几具遭到踩踏的尸体。领主舰长能安然无恙地走出来，简直是个奇迹。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは扉に近づこうとしたが、扉を拳で叩くパニック状態の人間に囲まれた。突然扉が開くと人間が傾れ込んできた。数体の遺体が踏み荒らされて残っている。ロード・キャプテンが無傷で済んだのは奇跡だ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは扉に近づこうとしたが、扉を拳で叩くパニック状態の人間に囲まれた。突然扉が開くと人間が傾れ込んできた。数体の遺体が踏み荒らされて残っている。ロード・キャプテンが無傷で済んだのは奇跡だ。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain versucht, zu den Türen zu gelangen, aber sie sind von panischen Menschen umgeben, die mit den Fäusten auf sie einschlagen. Plötzlich öffnen sich die Türen, und die Menge strömt heraus, wobei mehrere zertrampelte Körper zurückbleiben. Es ist ein Wunder, dass der Lord Captain es unverletzt hinaus schafft.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

languages.text: {name} essaie d'atteindre la sortie, mais elle est bloquée par une foule paniquée qui martèle les portes de ses poings. Soudain, les portes s'ouvrent, et les membres d'équipage se précipitent à l'extérieur, laissent derrière eux plusieurs corps piétinés. Par miracle, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} parvient cependant à sortir indemne de la débandade.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

traits.locale_text: {name} essaie d'atteindre la sortie, mais elle est bloquée par une foule paniquée qui martèle les portes de ses poings. Soudain, les portes s'ouvrent, et les membres d'équipage se précipitent à l'extérieur, laissent derrière eux plusieurs corps piétinés. Par miracle, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} parvient cependant à sortir indemne de la débandade.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan kapılara ulaşmaya çalışsa da etrafları, kapıları yumruklayan panik hâlindeki insanlarla çevrili. Kapılar aniden açılıyor ve kalabalık, arkasında birkaç ezilmiş ceset bırakarak dışarı akın ediyor. Lord Kaptan'ın yaralanmadan kurtulması bir mucize.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tries to get to the doors, but they are surrounded by panicking people who are slamming their fists on them. The doors suddenly open, and the crowd pours out, leaving behind several trampled bodies. It is a miracle that the Lord Captain makes it out uninjured.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan kapılara ulaşmaya çalışsa da etrafları, kapıları yumruklayan panik hâlindeki insanlarla çevrili. Kapılar aniden açılıyor ve kalabalık, arkasında birkaç ezilmiş ceset bırakarak dışarı akın ediyor. Lord Kaptan'ın yaralanmadan kurtulması bir mucize.
